mainBoard.name: Traitorous Greed
mainBoard.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Add two mana of any one color. (The creature can attack and {T} this turn.)

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn't cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

Traitorous Greed can target any creature, even one that's untapped or one you already control.

mainBoard.name: Unleash Fury
mainBoard.originalText: Double the power of target creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: If an effect instructs you to “double” a creature's power, that creature gets +X/+0, where X is its power as that effect begins to apply. If its power is negative, instead it gets -X/-0 where X is how far below 0 its power is. The value of X won't change if another effect alters the creature's power later in the turn.
